definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: mast (NH id.; √ unknown; Hoffm:Ph. Inscr. 27 f. conj. [[תארן]], from [[ארן]], v. [[אׂרֶן]]);—abs. ´[[ת]]:, of Tyre as ship Ez Eze 27:5; [[עַל־ראׁשׁ הָהָר]] ´[[ת]]: Is 30:17 (‖[[נֵם ]]), i.e. a (solitary) standard-pole, flag-staff; sf. [[תָּרְנׇם]] Is 33:23 (‖ [[נֵם]], [[חֲבָלִים]].
